prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAMWK_1530_SAUS",
  "name": "Family Weeknight Classics (SA & US)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "SouthAfrican",
      "American"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "StoveTop",
      "Oven"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Boerewors Dogs with Chakalaka and Oven Wedges",
  "description": "Pan-seared boerewors tucked into hot dog buns with a chakalaka-onion relish and crispy oven potato wedges. A quick South African–American family favorite.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 220°C/425°F.",
    "Line a baking tray with baking paper.",
    "Spread potato wedges on the tray.",
    "Peel and thinly slice the onion.",
    "Split hot dog buns lengthwise (not all the way through).",
    "Open the chakalaka can/jar and stir."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Bake potato wedges for 20–25 minutes until golden, turning once halfway.",
    "Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.",
    "Add boerewors and cook 12–15 minutes, turning often, until browned and cooked through (165°F/74°C).",
    "In the last 2 minutes of baking, warm the hot dog buns on the oven rack.",
    "In a small bowl, mix sliced onion with chakalaka to make a quick relish.",
    "Cut boerewors into 4 bun-length pieces.",
    "Assemble: place boerewors in buns, top with chakalaka-onion relish, and add ketchup and mustard to taste.",
    "Serve with the oven wedges."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "potato wedges",
      "quantity": "750 g",
      "preparation": "spread on tray"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": "for pan"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "boerewors",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "left as a coil"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "hot dog buns",
      "quantity": "4",
      "preparation": "split"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chakalaka",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "stirred"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ketchup",
      "quantity": "1/4 cup",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mustard",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],

      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],

    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Output schema:
        ```json
        {
  "product_matches": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "string",
      "selected_product_id": "string or null",
      "package_quantity": "float or int indicating number of retail packs",
      "package_notes": "brief rationale",
      "ingredient_line": "optional text using product name"
    }
  ]
}
        ```
